author: lgo
msg: (serf_deflate_destroy_and_data): If the bucket is destroyed while
the zlib stream is still initialized, clean it up.

author: lgo
msg: In the test suite: don't reuse the same pool, but recreate one for each test.
This ensures that tests are running independently.
* test/test_context.c: For all tests, call test_setup on test entry and test_teardown
* test/test_serf.h: Don't declare the test_pool, declare test_setup
* test/test_all.c: Don't declare and create the global test_pool.

author: lgo
msg: * outgoing.c: Destroy the httpconn bucket on conn. reset to avoid a memory leak.

author: lgo
msg: Add comments and handle a returned status.
